TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Google Developersâ€™ Group, Jaypee Institute of Information and Technology!.Also known as GDG JIIT NOIDA, this is a platform made for every tech-savvy who needs to quench his thirst for technology, and take him to dizzying heights. Made from a team high-spirited members,we strive to spread our love for Google and its widespread works.Our team motto is:Giving Direction to Greatness.In a short span of its up-and-coming, we have organized numerous events, ranging from hours-long orientations and interactive sessions, to week-long workshops, and periodic competitive events
